description:
This mod adds 4 new seats that have 3 usable hotbars!
You can assign switches/buttons to the hotbars by colouring them accordingly:
[list]
[*]White: 1st hotbar
[*]Light Grey: 2nd hotbar
[*]Dark Grey: 3rd hotbar
[/list]
You can press your jump key(Space by default) to switch between hotbars.
name: Expanded Hotbar Seats
